attributes.action: Publish the scientific advice the Covid-19 Coronavirus approach is based on.
attributes.additional_details: Publishing the scientific advice that keep being refered to but as yet has not been shared will enable peer review, openness and increase public confidence in the handling of the coronavirus Covid-19
attributes.background: Publish the advice that is being used to make the key decisions about Covid-19 coronavirus such as keeping schools open, self-isolation and so on.
